historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-145, see notes following ยง 7-1531.01.

DC CODE ยง 7-1531.19d

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: If a donor amends an anatomical gift, or revokes one or more, but not all, anatomical gifts, the Registry shall be promptly revised to reflect the gift or gifts as amended.
If a donor revokes all anatomical gifts, the name of the former donor shall be promptly removed from the Registry.

title.text: Human Health Care and Safety. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Revised Uniform Anatomical Gift Act. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Effect of amendment or revocation of anatomical gift upon Registry.
